successes.title: Gothitropolis Raven Action Figure by Four Horsemen Studios
successes.description: Fan-selected Gothitropolis 6" fully-articulated Raven action figure (& variants) from award-winning Four Horsemen Toy Design Studios.

Pledges.description: 1) THANK YOU! Your name will be added to the SourceHorsemen.com website as a supporter of the Ravens project.
2) GOTHITROPOLIS STICKER! Full-color Gothitroplos logo sticker mailed to your US address. US ONLY unless part of another reward level.

3) GOTHITROPOLIS PRINTS! Two full-color mini-prints by Nathan Baertsch -- one Raven print and one Scarabus print -- mailed to your US address, plus all of the above rewards. US ONLY unless part of another reward level.

4) GOTHITROPOLIS RAVENS T-SHIRT! Show your support for the Gothitropolis Ravens Kickstarter project by sporting this incredible "Gothitropolis Ravens" t-shirt! (Available in sizes S through XXL), plus rewards 1 through 3. US ONLY unless part of another reward level.
5) THE BLACK RAVEN - US! One Black Raven action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!
6) THE GRIFFON - US! One Griffon action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!
7) THE VULTURE- US! One Vulture action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!
8) THE FALCON - US! One Falcon action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!
9) THE CARDINAL - US! One Cardinal action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!
10) KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE MINOTAUR THE DUCK - US! One Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck action figure shipped to your US address, plus rewards 1 through 3. Ships within continental US only!

11) KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE BLACK RAVEN BATTLE PACK! US - This set includes one screaming Black Raven head with a removable war helmet - which also fits the basic Raven head, the Raven's Blood Saber, and one Black Raven action figure shipped to your US address - plus rewards 1 through 3. SHIPPING WITHIN THE US ONLY!
12) THE BLACK RAVEN - INTERNATIONAL! One Black Raven action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!
13) THE GRIFFON - INTERNATIONAL! One Griffon action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!
14) THE VULTURE - INTERNATIONAL! One Vulture action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!
15) THE FALCON - INTERNATIONAL! One Falcon action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!
16) THE CARDINAL - INTERNATIONAL! One Cardinal action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

17) KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE MINOTAUR THE DUCK - INTERNATIONAL! One Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck action figure shipped to your international address, plus rewards 1 through 3. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

18) KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE BATTLE PACK! INTERNATIONAL - This set includes one screaming Black Raven head with a removable war helmet - which also fits the basic Raven head, the Raven's Blood Saber, and one Black Raven action figure shipped to your address - plus rewards 1 through 3. SHIPS INTERNATIONALLY!

19) GOTHITROPOLIS STARTER SET - US ONLY - One Scarabus action figure, one Black Raven action figure, and one random Time Keeper action figure, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and levels 1 through 3 shipped to your US address.  SHIPPING WITHIN US ONLY (for international orders see level 12)

23) BLACK RAVEN & GRIFFON 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Griffon, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

24) BLACK RAVEN & FALCON 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #2! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Falcon, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

25) BLACK RAVEN & KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE MINOTAUR THE DUCK 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #3! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

20) BLACK RAVEN & VULTURE 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Vulture, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

21) BLACK RAVEN & CARDINAL 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Cardinal, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

22) BLACK RAVENS 2 PC. SET - US ONLY #1! This two piece set includes two Black Ravens, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

26) GOTHITROPOLIS STARTER SET - INTERNATIONAL One Scarabus action figure, one Black Raven action figure, and one random Time Keeper action figure, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and levels 1 through 3 shipped to your international address. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

27) FANTASTIC SUPPORTER PACK - US ONLY! One Black Raven action figure, one Gothitropolis Ravens t-shirt (sizes S through XXL), one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and your name on the back of the Gothitropolis Ravens packaging, plus rewards 1 through 3.

28) BLACK RAVEN & GRIFFON 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Griffon, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

29) BLACK RAVEN & VULTURE 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Vulture, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

30) BLACK RAVEN & FALCON 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Falcon, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

31) BLACK RAVEN & CARDINAL 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, the Cardinal, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

32) BLACK RAVEN & KICKSTARTER EXCLUSIVE MINOTAUR THE DUCK 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes the Black Raven, Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

33) BLACK RAVENS 2 PC. SET INTERNATIONAL #1! This two piece set includes two Black Ravens, one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and rewards 1 through 3 all shipped to your US address - INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING!

34) FANTASTIC SUPPORTER PACK - INTERNATIONAL! One Black Raven action figure, one Gothitropolis Ravens t-shirt (sizes S through XXL), one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, and your name on the back of the Gothitropolis Ravens packaging, plus rewards 1 through 3. SHIPS INTERNATIONALLY!
35) 2-UP RAVEN BUST - US ONLY! One 2-up faux-bronzed or unpainted Raven bust of your choice on a Four Horsemen customized pedestal. SHIPS WITHIN US ONLY!

36) 2-UP RAVEN BUST - INTERNATIONAL! One 2-up faux-bronzed or unpainted Raven bust of your choice on Four Horsemen customized pedestal shipped anywhere within the continental United States. SHIPS INTERNATIONALLY!

37) GOTHITROPOLIS RAVENS 6-PACK - US ONLY! This set of 6 includes the Black Raven, The Griffon, The Vulture, The Falcon, The Cardinal, Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck, the screaming Black Raven head, the removable Raven War Helmet, the Raven's Blood Saber, one Gothitropolis Ravens t-shirt (sizes S through XXL), plus rewards 1 through 3. SHIPS WITHIN THE CONTINENTAL US ONLY!

38) BE A FOUR HORSEMEN INTERN FOR A DAY! A one day session at Four Horsemen Studios where you'll get a hands on look at how things are done stage by stage from the initial concept design to the final completed prototype. We'll have two sessions in early to mid December 2013 on two different  days available to five people per session. Specific dates to be determined. Transportation, lodging and food to be handled at your own expense.

39) GOTHITROPOLIS RAVENS 6-PACK - INTERNATIONAL! This set of 6 includes the Black Raven, The Griffon, The Vulture, The Falcon, The Cardinal, Kickstarter Exclusive Minotaur the Duck, the screaming Black Raven head, the removable Raven War Helmet, the Raven's Blood Saber, one Gothitropolis Ravens t-shirt (sizes S through XXL) - plus rewards 1 through 3. SHIPS INTERNATIONALLY!
40) FAUX BRONZE RAVEN 2-UP PROTOTYPE! One 2-up faux-bronzed Raven prototype figure of your choice displayed on a Four Horsemen customized flat base shipped anywhere in the world.

41) FULLY PAINTED RAVEN 2-UP PROTOTYPE! One 2-up fully painted Raven prototype figure of your choice (only 12 available: first backer = first choice) displayed on a Four Horsemen customized wall mounted perch base shipped anywhere in the world.

42) THE ULTIMATE BACKER! A day with the Four Horsemen! Airfare (within continental United States - Four Horsemen will cover international customer's airfare up to $600.00), ground transportation from airport to studio & hotel, two nights maximum hotel stay, and a free Taco Bell lunch provided by the Four Horsemen for one person. Also includes a one-day visit to Four Horsemen Studios where you'll get to spend the day seeing how things are done at the studio, one Four Horsemen customized bird cage, one 2-up Raven prototype of your choice with paint customized to your specifications, one full set of all available Raven action figures (including stretch goal figures and accessories), one screaming Black Raven head, one Raven War Helmet, one Raven Blood Saber, one Raven t-shirt (sizes S through XXL) and rewards 1 through 3. AVAILABLE TO US CUSTOMERS ONLY!
